about_the_game:
Explore this frozen, inhospitable world, filled with creatures toughened by the harsh environment. Battle against Frost Giants, Hobgoblins, Wraiths, Ice Lurkers, and the terrifying Wendigo.

Includes:
  • 30 new monsters adapted to cold environments
  • Over 20 new weapons and shields
  • Many new armors suitable for the cold
  • Several new spells and abilities
  • New in-town events and jobs
  • Additional facial parts for many races
  • 90 new and exotic loot items to discover

All expansion packs (DLC) add an additional world that you can choose to travel to when you go through the Gate. These add more variety and challenge to the base game.

NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.
